headline: Getting the Most From Your Digital Helper
abstract: Voice-activated helpers can automate lifeâ€™s little chores, once you get the hang of them.
lead_paragraph: Apple added its Siri assistant to the iPhone 4S model in 2011, giving users a hand-free way to schedule appointments, play music, look up information and perform other basic tasks. Less than a decade later, digital assistants are in a plethora of digital devices, including computers, smart speakers, dashboards and watches, and they can help you ease into the day and keep the household running smoothly.
